```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
library(invgamma)
library(MCMCpack)

source('changepoint-functions.R')
```

```{r}
set.seed(20)
Yk1 <- outcome_simulator(N = 150, k = 1)
Yk2 <- outcome_simulator(N = 150, k = 2)

head(Yk1)
```


```{r}
#| out-width: 100%
# for segment plotting
Yk1_segments <- Yk1 |>
  group_by(true_mu) |>
  summarize(t_min = min(t),
            t_max = max(t)) 

# observed time series
Yk1 |>
  ggplot(aes(x = t, y = y))+
  geom_line()+
  geom_point(size = 0.7)+
  theme_minimal()

ggsave('pseudo-timeseries1.pdf', bg = 'white', width = )

# true change point visualization
Yk1 |>
  ggplot(aes(x = t, y = y))+
  geom_vline(xintercept = 50,
             color = 'blue',
             linetype = 'dashed')+
  geom_segment(aes(x = t_min, xend = t_max, y = true_mu),
               data = Yk1_segments,
               color = 'grey70')+
  geom_point(size = 0.7)+
  theme_minimal()

ggsave('oracle-timeseries1.pdf', bg = 'white' )
```


```{r}
#| out-width: 100%
Yk2_segments <- Yk2 |>
  group_by(true_mu) |>
  summarize(t_min = min(t),
            t_max = max(t)) 

# observed time series
Yk2 |>
  ggplot(aes(x = t, y = y))+
  geom_line()+
  geom_point(size = 0.7)+
  theme_minimal()

ggsave('pseudo-timeseries2.pdf', bg = 'white')

# true change point visualization
Yk2 |>
  ggplot(aes(x = t, y = y))+
  geom_vline(xintercept = c(50,100),
             color = 'blue',
             linetype = 'dashed')+
  geom_segment(aes(x = t_min, xend = t_max, y = true_mu),
               data = Yk2_segments,
               color = 'grey70')+
  geom_point(size = 0.7)+
  theme_minimal()

ggsave('oracle-timeseries2.pdf', bg = 'white' )
```
